meanings.definition: The state or condition of being sore.
meanings.sent1: After the workout, the soreness in my muscles was intense.
meanings.sent2: She winced at the soreness in her back after lifting the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The soreness in his legs made him walk like a penguin, which made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The soreness in her heart from the breakup felt like a weight she couldn't shake off.
meanings.sent5: The soreness in his throat made it difficult for him to speak.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tender or painful to the touch.
meanings.sent1: The soreness of the bruise made her flinch when touched.
meanings.sent2: He applied a soothing cream to relieve the soreness of the sunburn.
meanings.sent3: The soreness of the cut was a constant reminder to be careful with the knife.
meanings.sent4: The soreness of the wound throbbed with each heartbeat.
meanings.sent5: The soreness of the bump on his head made him regret not wearing a helmet.
